The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23603](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23603) (build: Fix x86_64 <-> arm64 cross-compiling for macOS by hebasto)
* [#22380](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22380) (build: add and use C_STANDARD and CXX_STANDARD in depends by fanquake)
* [#22283](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22283) (build: Replace $(AT) with .SILENT by dgoncharov)
* [#21778](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21778) (POC: LLVM 13 & LLD based macOS toolchain by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
